Description:
Position Title:             SF Functional ConsultantEmployment Type:     Contract (9 months)Salary:                         up to 40K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Riyadh, KSA About the Client:A highly recognized international group handling Information Technology Services to various industries located in Riyadh, KSA. Job Description:  Recommending leading best SF practices to the customers
Coordinate as consultant to clients of different industries like Bank, Oil & Gas, Retail, Life Science & Food etc.
Guide the team for inbound and outbound integration of center jobs through Automation in SF projects.
Utilize various SuccessFactors reporting such as Canvas, Table and Dashboard for effective communication, Collaboration & Client (End-User) relationship management
Customize solutions via API on complex requirements. Skills
Skills:
Open to Asian and Arabic nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
Minimum 6 years of experience in SAP SF with various modules either combination or stand-alone of RCM, EC, LMS, PMGM, SPCDP, ECP etc.
Having SAP certification is highly preferred e.g., SAP Certified Application Associate, SAP Certified Technology Associate
